name: travel-art
description: Luxury hotel and artist exchange platform

scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix backend run build
scripts.build:frontend: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e:headless
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e:headless
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
